issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Update to parquet-format 2.6 and thrift 0.12
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7325](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7325). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`parquet-format 2.5` and `thrift 0.0.4` bring in outdated versions of third-party crates such as `byteorder`, `ordered-float`, and `num-traits`. Let's update as few of them have reached 1.0.
